pht.pack.name: Manic
pht.pack.author: @Hinge
pht.pack.desc.1:
Author - @Hinge
 
Reworks phantoms, adds sanity mechanics,
and adds a handful of new items.
pht.trigger_on: Sanity bar settings set to §l[DISPLAY ON, AUDIO ON]
pht.trigger_off: Sanity bar settings set to §l[DISPLAY OFF, AUDIO ON]
pht.trigger_audio: Sanity bar settings set to §l[DISPLAY OFF, AUDIO OFF]
pht.trigger_audio2: Sanity bar settings set to §l[DISPLAY ON, AUDIO OFF]
pht.global_trigger_on: Global sanity bar display and audio set to §l[ON]
pht.global_trigger_off: Global sanity bar display and audio set to §l[OFF]
